relevance.description: The solution must directly address the posed question.

correctness.description: The answers provided should be factually correct.

completeness.description: The task should be fully completed with no missing information.

reasoning_traceability.description: The reasoning process to arrive at the answer should be clear and traceable.

accuracy.description: The degree of accuracy with which the task is performed.

originality.description: The solution should not be directly copied from existing sources on the internet.

step_success.description: Each step required to complete the task must be successfully executed.

data_contamination_avoidance.description: The solution should prevent data contamination from unverified internet sources.
